Textual entailment.from sentence:
The Stanford Natural Language Inference ( SNLI ) corpus provides approximately 550K hypothesis / premise pairs .
Overall , adding ELMo to the ESIM model improves accuracy by an average of 0.7 % across five random seeds .

Coreference resolution.from sentence: In our experiments with the OntoNotes coreference annotations from the CoNLL 2012 shared task , adding ELMo improved the average F 1 by 3.2 % from 67.2 to 70.4 , establishing anew state of the art , again improving over the previous best ensemble result by 1.6 % F 1 .
